message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. Let me know if you're interested!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a price of $1800000 to purchase the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product, and I'm willing to consider a compromise. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $2200000. This is still a great deal, and I believe it's worth considering. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

I understand your position, Alice, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $2000000. I hope this proposal will be more in line with what you're considering.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence, and I'm willing to make one more concession. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $2100000. This is still a great deal, and I believe it's worth considering. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering my financial situation, I would like to propose a final offer of $2050000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence, but I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to a deal. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $2100000. This is my final offer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to sell the product to you. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
